CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Create Loop tables and task lists
CurrentVersion.description: Insert new Loop tables & task lists directly into whiteboards & copy/paste them across other Microsoft 365 hosts to coauthor content with others in real-time.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Create Loop tables and task lists
OldVersion.description: Insert new Loop tables & task lists directly into whiteboards & copy/paste them across other Microsoft 365 hosts to coauthor content with others in real-time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management – Forensic evidence (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: The forensic evidence capability is an opt-in add-in to Insider Risk Management, helping customers’ security teams get visual insights into potentially risky user actions that might lead to a data security incident. Forensic evidence is off by default and policy creation requires dual authorization. Customers determine what triggers the feature and manage investigation processes. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been updated to reflect the current release phase. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management – Forensic evidence (U.S. Government clouds)
OldVersion.description: The forensic evidence capability is an opt-in add-in to Insider Risk Management, helping customers’ security teams get visual insights into potentially risky user actions that might lead to a data security incident. Forensic evidence is off by default and policy creation requires dual authorization. Customers determine what triggers the feature and manage investigation processes. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been updated to reflect the current release phase. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enable second video stream with "Teams Content Camera on Desktop"
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to enable a second video stream to support both their Personal Video and Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature.  When enabling the Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature, the Personal Video is expected to be maintained so long that the user selects a separate Camera to support the two video streams. This feature will no longer be rolling out to classic Teams and will only be generally available in the new Teams experience with a revised Rollout Start schedule.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enable second video stream with "Teams Content Camera on Desktop"
OldVersion.description:
Users will be able to enable a second video
stream to support both their Personal Video and Teams Content Camera on Desktop
feature.  When enabling the Teams Content Camera on
Desktop feature, the Personal Video is expected to be maintained so long that
the user selects a separate Camera to support the two video streams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Viva Engage conversations and Q&A appears on Topic Card as Activity
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Viva Engage conversations and Q&A which are associated to a topic appear on the Topic Card as new activity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Viva Engage conversations and Q&A appears on Topic Card as Activity
OldVersion.description: ,Viva Engage conversations and Q&A which are associated to a topic appear on the Topic Card as new activity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
CurrentVersion.description: With Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
OldVersion.description:
With
Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no
longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and
tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and
no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Centrally manage branding for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your sites and pages.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Centrally manage branding for your organization
OldVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your sites and pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
OldVersion.description: ,Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Webinar Graph APIs allows users to get webinar data like attendee names, attendance duration, registration, and registrant cancellations. This data can be exported to be used in 3P systems including CRMs, marketing automation tools, LOB and Workflow apps. These APIs are designed to support business-to-business workflows.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Graph APIs
OldVersion.description:
The Teams Webinar Graph APIs allows users to get
webinar data like attendee names, attendance duration, registration, and
registrant cancellations. This data can be exported to be used in 3P systems
including CRMs, marketing automation tools, LOB and Workflow apps. These APIs
are designed to support business-to-business workflows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation
CurrentVersion.description: With Voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. This feature uses AI to filter out all background noise, including other people's voices. By leveraging your voice profile, this advanced noise suppression capability ensures only the user’s voice is transmitted. Whether you are in a busy office, a noisy cafe, or a crowded airport, you can communicate with confidence and clarity. Voice isolation is powered by our advanced deep learning, speech services, and audio processing technology, and it shows our dedication to solving user problems with AI and enhancing audio quality and experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation
OldVersion.description:
With Voice isolation, you can enjoy
clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. This
feature uses AI to filter out all background noise, including other people's
voices. By leveraging your voice profile, this advanced noise suppression
capability ensures only the user’s voice is transmitted. Whether you are in a
busy office, a noisy cafe, or a crowded airport, you can communicate with
confidence and clarity. Voice
isolation is powered by our advanced deep learning, speech services, and
audio processing technology, and it shows our dedication to solving user
problems with AI and enhancing audio quality and experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Create more personal and engaging backgrounds by applying advanced effects. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Create more personal and engaging backgrounds by applying advanced effects. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note: We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting
for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the
meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after
meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins
identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is
over for up to 7 days.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Share an Update to Outlook with Goal Broadcast
CurrentVersion.description: With "Share an Update," leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Share an Update to Outlook with Goal Broadcast
OldVersion.description: With "Share an Update," leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
OldVersion.description:
Remote
attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame
video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition
(including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integrated Apps in M365 admin center for managing apps across M365 suite products
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing Integrated Apps in M365 admin center to allow admins to discover, deploy and manage apps across various M365 suite products.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integrated Apps in M365 admin center for managing apps across M365 suite products
OldVersion.description: Introducing Integrated Apps in M365 admin center to allow admins to discover, deploy and manage apps across various M365 suite products.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Collaborative notes in Teams meeting recordings
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables users to view and edit collaborative meeting notes while watching Teams meeting recordings in Stream. Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in.  Assigned tasks in collaborative meeting notes automatically sync with To Do & Planner.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Collaborative notes in Teams meeting recordings
OldVersion.description: This feature enables users to view and edit collaborative meeting notes while watching Teams meeting recordings in Stream. Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in.  Assigned tasks in collaborative meeting notes automatically sync with To Do & Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Modern Translation in Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description:
In Outlook, you can translate words, phrases, and full messages when you need them. You can also set Outlook to automatically translate messages you receive in other languages. When you receive an email message in another language, you'll see a prompt at the top of the message asking if you'd like Outlook to translate it into your preferred language.

More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/translator-for-outlook-3d7e12ed-99d6-406e-a453-b9db0d9653fa#OfficeVersion=newer-win

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Modern Translation in Outlook on the Web
OldVersion.description:
In Outlook, you can translate words, phrases, and full messages when you need them. You can also set Outlook to automatically translate messages you receive in other languages. When you receive an email message in another language, you'll see a prompt at the top of the message asking if you'd like Outlook to translate it into your preferred language.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/translator-for-outlook-3d7e12ed-99d6-406e-a453-b9db0d9653fa#OfficeVersion=newer-win

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Live text
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to see what other users are typing in Whiteboard objects in real-time. i.e. when a user is typing in a sticky note, you will be able to see the text as they type it.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Live text
OldVersion.description: The ability to see what other users are typing in Whiteboard objects in real-time. i.e. when a user is typing in a sticky note, you will be able to see the text as they type it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Create a Viva Pulse from scratch
CurrentVersion.description: Build your Viva Pulse from scratch by creating your own questions or choosing from the question library.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Create a Viva Pulse from scratch
OldVersion.description: Build your Viva Pulse from scratch by creating your own questions or choosing from the question library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Select Viva Pulse Questions from a Library
CurrentVersion.description: Create a Viva Pulse using research-backed questions found by browsing or searching the question library.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Select Viva Pulse Questions from a Library
OldVersion.description: Create a Viva Pulse using research-backed questions found by browsing or searching the question library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Customizable goal terms
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations and teams now have the flexibility to customize terminology in line with their own goal setting methodology and preferences, beyond the OKR framework.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Customizable goal terms
OldVersion.description: Organizations and teams now have the flexibility to customize terminology in line with their own goal setting methodology and preferences, beyond the OKR framework.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: - Download File Evidence for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention investigations
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, DLP investigators can download the full file that resulted in the DLP policy match as evidence in SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. The option to download files will be available for DLP alerts in Microsoft Purview compliance portal as well as the DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: - Download File Evidence for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention investigations
OldVersion.description: With this capability, DLP investigators can download the full file that resulted in the DLP policy match as evidence in SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. The option to download files will be available for DLP alerts in Microsoft Purview compliance portal as well as the DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Viva Engage Copilot leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to provide you with personalized assistance to create engaging communications that support your professional goals.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Engage Copilot
OldVersion.description: ,Viva Engage Copilot leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to provide you with personalized assistance to create engaging communications that support your professional goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Network Analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This new analytics capability helps users understand engagement trends across their entire organization. Network analytics provides an at-a-glance overview of your organization’s top usage trends including employee sentiment, cross-community insights and AI-powered summarization to help you stay up-to-date with all the activity that occurs within your company.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Network Analytics
OldVersion.description: ,This new analytics capability helps users understand engagement trends across their entire organization. Network analytics provides an at-a-glance overview of your organization’s top usage trends including employee sentiment, cross-community insights and AI-powered summarization to help you stay up-to-date with all the activity that occurs within your company.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
OldVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced file type coverage for DLP on Windows endpoints
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced file type coverage for DLP on Windows endpoints
OldVersion.description: ,With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
CurrentVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
OldVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Boosted News Notifications
CurrentVersion.description:
As an enhancement to the existing news notifications in Viva Connections, users will now also receive a news notifications when news is boosted on the organisation's news site and the news post has an audience target set.
The navigational behaviour will be the same as existing news notifications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Boosted News Notifications
OldVersion.description:
As an enhancement to the existing news notifications in Viva Connections, users will now also receive a news notifications when news is boosted on the organisation's news site and the news post has an audience target set.
The navigational behaviour will be the same as existing news notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
OldVersion.description: ,Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Add individual file shortcuts in OneDrive for Web
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will let you create a shortcut to files stored in other people's OneDrive and document libraries to be able to easily find it within your OneDrive. These file shortcuts can be moved, renamed, or deleted without impacting the source content, and they will show up in OneDrive for Web, Android, iOS, and sync client endpoints.

OldVersion.title: OneDrive: Add individual file shortcuts in OneDrive for Web
OldVersion.description: This feature will let you create a shortcut to files stored in other people's OneDrive and document libraries to be able to easily find it within your OneDrive. These file shortcuts can be moved, renamed, or deleted without impacting the source content, and they will show up in OneDrive for Web, Android, iOS, and sync client endpoints.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this new feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
OldVersion.description:
,With this new
feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security
incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared
with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be
updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated
analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft
Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify
potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data
leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to
create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and
organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are
pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in
place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
CurrentVersion.description: ,The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
OldVersion.description: ,The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: New ‘notes’ tab when creating a standard Teams channel
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a new standard channel, a new Notes tab will be automatically created. Each Teams team will have a dedicated OneNote workbook and each channel will have its own section, making it easier on the workgroup to add their notes.

OldVersion.title: OneNote: New ‘notes’ tab when creating a standard Teams channel
OldVersion.description: When creating a new standard channel, a new Notes tab will be automatically created. Each Teams team will have a dedicated OneNote workbook and each channel will have its own section, making it easier on the workgroup to add their notes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Yammer / Viva Engage Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security events for Microsoft Viva Engage (formerly known as Yammer). As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 6 new Microsoft Viva Engage events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. ThreadViewed; 2. ThreadAccessFailure; 3. MessageUpdated; 4. FileAccessFailure; 5. MessageCreation; 6. GroupAccessFailure

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Yammer / Viva Engage Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Purview is
expanding access to wider cloud security events for Microsoft Viva Engage
(formerly known as Yammer). As part of the changes, standard users of Purview
Audit will begin to generate 6 new Microsoft Viva Engage events that were
previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following
events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. ThreadViewed; 2.
ThreadAccessFailure; 3. MessageUpdated; 4. FileAccessFailure; 5.
MessageCreation; 6. GroupAccessFailure

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
OldVersion.description:
Make your video interactive
and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text.
Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can
add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to
the right information.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remove items from your activity feed
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to remove items they no longer need from their activity feed, helping the user stay on top of their notifications.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remove items from your activity feed
OldVersion.description:
Users will be able to
remove items they no longer need from their activity feed, helping the user
stay on top of their notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat between multi-tenant organization contacts will default to external chat
CurrentVersion.description: We are cancelling this item because it will be included in a broader roadmap communication about multi-tenant organization (MTO) improvements. 1:1 chat between MTO contacts will now default to external chat, creating a single conversation thread. As part of this change, existing B2B chat threads will be available as read-only.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat between multi-tenant organization contacts will default to external chat
OldVersion.description:
1:1 chat between
multi-tenant organization (MTO) contacts will now default to external chat,
creating a single conversation thread. As part of this change, existing B2B
chat threads will be available as read-only.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
OldVersion.description:
We're introducing the ability to record and
insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for
Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or
both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
OldVersion.description:
We’re introducing the
ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook
for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to
you, you will be able to watch it directly in
your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same
organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video.
Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the
video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the
organization’s file sharing settings).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
OldVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
Intelligent
recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily
browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access
AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
OldVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Calendar notifications in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now triage the calendar notifications in their Activity Feed and will get notifications for meeting invites, updates, cancellations, and forwards (if the user is the meeting organizer). These notifications will show up as unread in the Activity Feed pane and will display the details when a user clicks on it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: ,The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enhanced Policy Conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Create with Templates
CurrentVersion.description: We're refreshing the file creation experience in OneDrive for Web which you initiate by clicking the “Add new” button. Soon, clicking the “Add new” button in OneDrive will give you the option to create a blank file or choose from a selection a high-quality, beautifully designed Word, Excel and PowerPoint templates to jumpstart your work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: ,To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
CurrentVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Create Goals Tab in Microsoft Teams Chats and Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to add Viva Goals as a tab in a Microsoft Teams chat or channel, so that they can see their goals in the flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 3P eCDN support for town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Admins have the ability to disable Microsoft first party eCDN at a user level within a tenant for users licensed with Teams Premium and switch the users back to using a third-party eCDN as they prefer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Teams Channels announcements in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: If a Frontline worker (FLW) licensed user is @mentioned in a Teams channel announcement, the announcement will be displayed in Viva Connections so that the user can find all their important updates in a single place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags in Shared Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people within shared channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Save filters for Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,Ability to save the filters applied to Activity Explorer and use them later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Adding topics to posts in Viva Engage will default open for question post types and be aligned with new topic experiences as seen in Answers in Viva.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room Remote on Desktop for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The Room Remote feature enables touchless meeting experiences by allowing users to control a nearby shared Teams Rooms device (Windows or Android) from their PC companion device with the Teams client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Add Images to Check-In Notes and Review Dashboards
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, users can attach images to check-in notes and dashboards in Viva Goals to better illustrate their ideas visually.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Facilitate effortless sharing of goals and goal progress with the enhanced sharing functionality in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
CurrentVersion.description: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
OldVersion.description: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status for mobile
CurrentVersion.description: Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Live meeting status
OldVersion.description:
Teams calendar on
mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the
participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the
duration of the meeting.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Create Loop tables and task lists
CurrentVersion.description: Insert new Loop tables & task lists directly into whiteboards & copy/paste them across other Microsoft 365 hosts to coauthor content with others in real-time.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Create Loop tables and task lists
CurrentVersion.description: Insert new Loop tables & task lists directly into whiteboards & copy/paste them across other Microsoft 365 hosts to coauthor content with others in real-time.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management – Forensic evidence (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: The forensic evidence capability is an opt-in add-in to Insider Risk Management, helping customers’ security teams get visual insights into potentially risky user actions that might lead to a data security incident. Forensic evidence is off by default and policy creation requires dual authorization. Customers determine what triggers the feature and manage investigation processes. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies to manage security and compliance. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy. Note: The roadmap item was inadvertently marked rolling out and has now been updated to reflect the current release phase. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enable second video stream with "Teams Content Camera on Desktop"
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to enable a second video stream to support both their Personal Video and Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature.  When enabling the Teams Content Camera on Desktop feature, the Personal Video is expected to be maintained so long that the user selects a separate Camera to support the two video streams. This feature will no longer be rolling out to classic Teams and will only be generally available in the new Teams experience with a revised Rollout Start schedule.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Topics - Viva Engage conversations and Q&A appears on Topic Card as Activity
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Viva Engage conversations and Q&A which are associated to a topic appear on the Topic Card as new activity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archive channels
CurrentVersion.description: With Archive Channels, owners and administrators can archive channels that are no longer in use while preserving their content, including messages, files, and tabs. The archived channel is removed from the active teams and channels list and no more actions will be allowed. If needed, the channel can be restored.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Centrally manage branding for your organization
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your sites and pages.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Syntex: Optical Character Recognition in OneDrive and SharePoint supports multi-page PDF and TIFF files
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Currently, OCR is available only for standalone Images. With this update image-only PDF and TIFF files in OneDrive and SharePoint will also benefit from OCR.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Teams Webinar Graph APIs
CurrentVersion.description: The Teams Webinar Graph APIs allows users to get webinar data like attendee names, attendance duration, registration, and registrant cancellations. This data can be exported to be used in 3P systems including CRMs, marketing automation tools, LOB and Workflow apps. These APIs are designed to support business-to-business workflows.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Voice isolation
CurrentVersion.description: With Voice isolation, you can enjoy clear and uninterrupted calls or meetings, no matter where you are. This feature uses AI to filter out all background noise, including other people's voices. By leveraging your voice profile, this advanced noise suppression capability ensures only the user’s voice is transmitted. Whether you are in a busy office, a noisy cafe, or a crowded airport, you can communicate with confidence and clarity. Voice isolation is powered by our advanced deep learning, speech services, and audio processing technology, and it shows our dedication to solving user problems with AI and enhancing audio quality and experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Decorate your background (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Create more personal and engaging backgrounds by applying advanced effects. This will only be available in the new Microsoft Teams experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note:  We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Extended Real-time telemetry retention for upto 7 days (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: To facilitate meeting quality troubleshooting for admins in Teams admin center, real-time telemetry available during the meeting will be retained for an extended period of time (up to 7 days after meeting is ended) for users with Premium licenses. This will help admins identify and fix quality issues using granular telemetry after the meeting is over for up to 7 days. Note: We have updated the release phase and month to reflect the current state. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Share an Update to Outlook with Goal Broadcast
CurrentVersion.description: With "Share an Update," leaders can share updates of their team goals to the members of their organization directly from Viva Goals. Updates are sent to users via email. Note: We are adjusting the roadmap release phase to reflect the current state.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enabling cameras with IntelliFrame and People Recognition experiences in the new Microsoft Teams app
CurrentVersion.description: Remote attendees in a hybrid meeting will be able to view multi-stream IntelliFrame video, panoramic room view, and in-room attendees with speaker recognition (including name labels) in the new Teams desktop client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integrated Apps in M365 admin center for managing apps across M365 suite products
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing Integrated Apps in M365 admin center to allow admins to discover, deploy and manage apps across various M365 suite products.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Collaborative notes in Teams meeting recordings
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables users to view and edit collaborative meeting notes while watching Teams meeting recordings in Stream. Collaborative notes allow meeting attendees to co-create and collaborate on their meeting agenda, notes, and action items. Since Collaborative notes are a Loop component, it is always in sync regardless of how many places they live in.  Assigned tasks in collaborative meeting notes automatically sync with To Do & Planner.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Modern Translation in Outlook on the Web
CurrentVersion.description:
In Outlook, you can translate words, phrases, and full messages when you need them. You can also set Outlook to automatically translate messages you receive in other languages. When you receive an email message in another language, you'll see a prompt at the top of the message asking if you'd like Outlook to translate it into your preferred language.

More info: https://support.microsoft.com/office/translator-for-outlook-3d7e12ed-99d6-406e-a453-b9db0d9653fa#OfficeVersion=newer-win

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Live text
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to see what other users are typing in Whiteboard objects in real-time. i.e. when a user is typing in a sticky note, you will be able to see the text as they type it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Create a Viva Pulse from scratch
CurrentVersion.description: Build your Viva Pulse from scratch by creating your own questions or choosing from the question library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Select Viva Pulse Questions from a Library
CurrentVersion.description: Create a Viva Pulse using research-backed questions found by browsing or searching the question library.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals – Customizable goal terms
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations and teams now have the flexibility to customize terminology in line with their own goal setting methodology and preferences, beyond the OKR framework.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: - Download File Evidence for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention investigations
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, DLP investigators can download the full file that resulted in the DLP policy match as evidence in SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. The option to download files will be available for DLP alerts in Microsoft Purview compliance portal as well as the DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention: - Download File Evidence for Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention investigations
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, DLP investigators can download the full file that resulted in the DLP policy match as evidence in SharePoint and OneDrive for Business. The option to download files will be available for DLP alerts in Microsoft Purview compliance portal as well as the DLP alerts in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Copilot in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Viva Engage Copilot leverages LLM (Large Language Model) AI technology to provide you with personalized assistance to create engaging communications that support your professional goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Network Analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This new analytics capability helps users understand engagement trends across their entire organization. Network analytics provides an at-a-glance overview of your organization’s top usage trends including employee sentiment, cross-community insights and AI-powered summarization to help you stay up-to-date with all the activity that occurs within your company.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Microsoft 365 Archive for Sites
CurrentVersion.description: ,The feature enables you to save on costs of storage exceeding the quota limit by archiving the inactive sites in SharePoint.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Enhanced file type coverage for DLP on Windows endpoints
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this release, the file type coverage to scan, classify and protect sensitive content on windows endpoint devices with Microsoft Purview Data Loss Prevention policies will increase from current ~40 file types to 100+ file types. This release will make the coverage of file types on endpoint consistent with other locations such as Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive. This will also include other enhancements like detecting label from pfile, detecting sensitive content in metadata, and detecting sensitive content in PDF forms.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
CurrentVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva : Connections Boosted News Notifications
CurrentVersion.description:
As an enhancement to the existing news notifications in Viva Connections, users will now also receive a news notifications when news is boosted on the organisation's news site and the news post has an audience target set.
The navigational behaviour will be the same as existing news notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match adding support for role-based access control (RBAC) for EDM upload authorization
CurrentVersion.description: ,Customers will be able to choose to leverage RBAC to authorize users for uploading data to the Exact Data Match (EDM) service instead of leveraging the EDM_DataUploaders security group for authorization.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Add individual file shortcuts in OneDrive for Web
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will let you create a shortcut to files stored in other people's OneDrive and document libraries to be able to easily find it within your OneDrive. These file shortcuts can be moved, renamed, or deleted without impacting the source content, and they will show up in OneDrive for Web, Android, iOS, and sync client endpoints.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Progressive alert scoring
CurrentVersion.description:
,
With this new feature, user activities that could potentially result in data security incidents will be assessed more frequently within a 24-hour period compared with the current practice of once every 24 hours. Alert insights will now be updated every few hours with this increased frequency, providing designated analysts with timely alerts and continuously evolving insights. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) Jobs report - access for eDiscovery Manager
CurrentVersion.description: ,The access to the Jobs Report in eDiscovery (Premium) will be extended to eDiscovery Managers. eD Managers will be able to view the tenant wide quota available and list of jobs in the cases they have access to.

CurrentVersion.title: OneNote: New ‘notes’ tab when creating a standard Teams channel
CurrentVersion.description: When creating a new standard channel, a new Notes tab will be automatically created. Each Teams team will have a dedicated OneNote workbook and each channel will have its own section, making it easier on the workgroup to add their notes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New Yammer / Viva Engage Logs for Microsoft Purview Audit Standard Users
CurrentVersion.description: Microsoft Purview is expanding access to wider cloud security events for Microsoft Viva Engage (formerly known as Yammer). As part of the changes, standard users of Purview Audit will begin to generate 6 new Microsoft Viva Engage events that were previously generated only for Audit Premium licensed users. The following events will now be provided for all Audit Standard users: 1. ThreadViewed; 2. ThreadAccessFailure; 3. MessageUpdated; 4. FileAccessFailure; 5. MessageCreation; 6. GroupAccessFailure

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Add a hyperlink or text callout to a video at specific times
CurrentVersion.description: Make your video interactive and more engaging by adding annotations that can include hyperlinks and text. Call out important moments or share documents and other links to additional resources. You can add text and links anywhere in the video timeline to help guide your viewers to the right information.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Remove items from your activity feed
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to remove items they no longer need from their activity feed, helping the user stay on top of their notifications.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Track Read Receipts within Outlook on the Web and the New Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: We're developing the ability to view the updated Read Receipt status of recipients from the sent item directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Chat between multi-tenant organization contacts will default to external chat
CurrentVersion.description: We are cancelling this item because it will be included in a broader roadmap communication about multi-tenant organization (MTO) improvements. 1:1 chat between MTO contacts will now default to external chat, creating a single conversation thread. As part of this change, existing B2B chat threads will be available as read-only.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream video recordings in the new Outlook for Windows and web
CurrentVersion.description: We're introducing the ability to record and insert Stream video recordings in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon you will be able to record a video of yourself, your screen or both, directly from Outlook and insert the recording in your email.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Stream videos can now be watched inline in Outlook
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing the ability to watch Stream videos inline in Outlook on the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Soon, if someone pastes a Stream video link in a supported Outlook app and sends it to you, you will be able to watch it directly in your inbox. The videos will play inline for recipients within the same organization, meaning you will not have to leave Outlook to watch the video. Recipients outside the organization, and those not using the new Outlook or web, will see a link to the video which they can watch in the Stream web app (depending on the organization’s file sharing settings).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Adoption Score AI assistance category
CurrentVersion.description: We are introducing a new people experiences category in Adoption Score in the Microsoft 365 admin center. The new category helps organizations understand the adoption Microsoft Copilot features in Microsoft 365.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for scheduled channel meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available for scheduled channel meetings, so users can easily browse the meeting recording by speakers and topics, as well as access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Azure protected voicemail on Teams App
CurrentVersion.description: Teams users will now have link to their Azure protected voicemails from the Teams App. Users will get notification for the voicemail on the Teams App and can open the attached link to access the voicemail on the web browser.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Calendar notifications in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now triage the calendar notifications in their Activity Feed and will get notifications for meeting invites, updates, cancellations, and forwards (if the user is the meeting organizer). These notifications will show up as unread in the Activity Feed pane and will display the details when a user clicks on it.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Latest meeting experiences with performance improvements on web for Safari and Firefox (for anonymous join only)
CurrentVersion.description: ,The latest Teams meeting experiences will be available for Teams on the web in Safari and Firefox browsers - including performance improvements, refreshed pre-join, updated meeting stage, and the updated meeting toolbar. (for anonymous join only)

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Communication Compliance - Enhanced Policy Conditions
CurrentVersion.description: Three updates are coming to enhance policy conditions. First, our updated policy conditions enable the detection of messages sent and received both to and from external email addresses, allowing you to identify specific instances of information being shared with external contacts. Secondly, with the new OR condition capability, you can combine multiple conditions within the same policy, creating custom logic to suit your unique compliance requirements. Lastly, to make policy creation and updates a seamless process, we've introduced the ability to test conditions before implementing them. By using sample messages, you can evaluate how your conditions will perform and fine-tune them to align with your compliance goals.

CurrentVersion.title: OneDrive: Create with Templates
CurrentVersion.description: We're refreshing the file creation experience in OneDrive for Web which you initiate by clicking the “Add new” button. Soon, clicking the “Add new” button in OneDrive will give you the option to create a blank file or choose from a selection a high-quality, beautifully designed Word, Excel and PowerPoint templates to jumpstart your work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management - Policy wizard enhancements
CurrentVersion.description: ,To enhance the user experience for editing and creating policies, we will be making improvements to the Trigger, Trigger threshold, Indicator threshold, and Summary pages of the policy wizard. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Teams admin center - external domain activity report
CurrentVersion.description: The external domain activity report will show Teams administrators which domains their users communicate with. Available for both those with open federation on and those with explicit allow lists.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals—Create Goals Tab in Microsoft Teams Chats and Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users will be able to add Viva Goals as a tab in a Microsoft Teams chat or channel, so that they can see their goals in the flow of work.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: 3P eCDN support for town halls (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Admins have the ability to disable Microsoft first party eCDN at a user level within a tenant for users licensed with Teams Premium and switch the users back to using a third-party eCDN as they prefer.

CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: 45 days after last used for Allow
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can configure allows to be removed after 45 days from the last used date. This way they can keep ensuring the delivery of the emails till the filtering has learned.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Teams Channels announcements in Viva Connections
CurrentVersion.description: If a Frontline worker (FLW) licensed user is @mentioned in a Teams channel announcement, the announcement will be displayed in Viva Connections so that the user can find all their important updates in a single place.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags will be supported in Private Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people in private channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags in Shared Channels
CurrentVersion.description: ,Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people within shared channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Tags in Shared Channels
CurrentVersion.description: Users can now use team tags to @ mention groups of people within shared channels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Save filters for Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: ,Ability to save the filters applied to Activity Explorer and use them later.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics in Viva Engage
CurrentVersion.description: Adding topics to posts in Viva Engage will default open for question post types and be aligned with new topic experiences as seen in Answers in Viva.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Room Remote on Desktop for GCC
CurrentVersion.description: The Room Remote feature enables touchless meeting experiences by allowing users to control a nearby shared Teams Rooms device (Windows or Android) from their PC companion device with the Teams client.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - Add Images to Check-In Notes and Review Dashboards
CurrentVersion.description: With this capability, users can attach images to check-in notes and dashboards in Viva Goals to better illustrate their ideas visually.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Goals - New goal sharing experience
CurrentVersion.description: Facilitate effortless sharing of goals and goal progress with the enhanced sharing functionality in Viva Goals.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: New location for add-ins and integration with Teams search-based message extensions
CurrentVersion.description: We are consolidating all the add-ins into a flyout menu in the ribbon and adding Teams search-based message extensions into this same flyout.

CurrentVersion.description: Teams calendar on mobile devices displays the live status of a meeting with avatars of the participants who are in the call, whether the meeting is being recorded and the duration of the meeting.
